name: 王耀德
objective: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
schedule:
week 1:Ch-22：Electrostatics
week 2~3:Ch-23：The Electric Field
week 3~4:Ch-24：Gauss's Law
week 4~5.Ch-25：Electric Potential
week 5~6:Ch-26：Capacitors & Dielectrics
week 6~7:Ch-27：Current & Resistance
week 7~8:Ch-28：Direct Current Circuits
week 9:Review & Midterm Exam
week 10:Ch-29：The Magnetic Field
week 11:Ch-30：Sources of The Magnetic Field
week 12:Ch-31：Electromagnetic Induction
week 13:Ch-32：Inductance & Magnetic Materials
week 14:Ch-33：Alternating Current Circuits
week 15:Ch-34：Maxwell's Equations; Electromagnetic Waves
week 16~17:Ch-39~41：Introduction to Modern Physics
week 18:Final Exam
scorePolicy:
quizzes:15% x 2
midterm:25%
final:25%
homeworks:15%
participation:5% + extra 10%
materials: Textbook:University Physics, by Harris Benson, revised ed..
